rolesAndResponsibilities: Collaborate with the data engineering team to design, develop, and maintain scalable data pipelines.
Work with relational databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server) to ensure data integrity and accessibility.
Gain hands-on experience with NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB, Cassandra, Redis) and spatial databases (e.g., PostGIS, Oracle Spatial).
Utilize scripting languages (e.g., Python) for data manipulation and analysis.
Assist in the creation of data visualizations using tools like Tableau or Power BI.
Contribute to the development and optimization of ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes.
Communicate effectively with team members to understand requirements and deliver results.
requirements: Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in Computer Engineering or a related field.
Strong understanding of relational databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or SQL Server.
Familiarity with NoSQL databases like MongoDB, Cassandra, or Redis.
Knowledge of spatial databases such as PostGIS or Oracle Spatial.
Proficiency in scripting languages (e.g., Python) for data manipulation and analysis.
Basic knowledge of data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI).
Understanding of ETL processes.
Strong analytical and critical thinking skills.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and adapt to changing priorities.

rolesAndResponsibilities: Assist in developing and maintaining websites using PHP, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Collaborate with the team to enhance UI/UX and ensure responsive web design.
Debug and troubleshoot website issues.
Optimize web pages for speed and scalability.
Work with databases and integrate APIs as needed.
Stay updated with the latest web development trends and technologies.
requirements: Basic knowledge of PHP, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Understanding of responsive design principles.
Familiarity with MySQL or other databases (a plus).
Problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

rolesAndResponsibilities: • Develop, test, and maintain high-quality Python code under the guidance of senior developers.

• Assist in troubleshooting and resolving application issues, ensuring smooth operation of software.
• Document software functionalities to streamline future enhancements and maintenance.
• Contribute innovative ideas to the development process, fostering a culture of continuous improvement.
• Participate in team meetings and contribute to the planning and execution of project tasks.
requirements: Apply before 15th February 2025.

• Understanding of data structures to facilitate optimal data management within applications.
